ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: ... stupid me... sorry, i mixed up some things: Clurg is an Ogre not a Troll. ... only clerics, pallies and necros can res. i know clerics can do this very
ygData.messageBody:
> >>>but wait ... where is Clurg now? the trolls had to leave their home
> tome and have to stay in neriak now ... %-&
>
> Do you mean that Clurg's goon has left Ogguk and I might be able to
> give him the Stein components? I a bit lost - as usual LOL

stupid me... sorry, i mixed up some things: Clurg is an Ogre not a Troll.


> >>>there are three classes who you should be looking for:
> - rogues: if you know the location where you died, but other classes
> have problems to get there and back again, get an rogue. the
> sneak&hide makes them invisible to most of the critters throughout
> the world.
> - necros & SKs: they can summon a corpse ... it isn't cheap,
> but before you will loose some "special" items, they can help.
>
> Does these classes RES you? And could I make myself a Rogue, SK or
> Necro and RES my Enchantress corpse?

only clerics, pallies and necros can res. i know clerics can do this
very early, but i am not so sure about pallies. necros have to be
50+ to res... not sure about the level.

necros (and SKs, not sure about level) can summon the corpse
to you. the spell needs a component which costs some PP.

besides, a corpse will only remain in game for a certain time. after
that time it goes away, with all the things on it.

i don't think the game allows to RES yourself, but you can consent
one of your alts to pull your corpse.


- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
